long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The LinkChecker Extension is a powerful tool designed to simplify backlink monitoring and SEO analysis. With just a few clicks, you can effortlessly check and monitor backlinks, keeping your link-building efforts organized and efficient.

Backlink Management Features:
- Add your project and highlight all your backlinks on the page
- Check if your backlink is dofollow or nofollow
- View href and anchor text
- Determine if the page is blocked by robots.txt, meta tag, or X-Robot-Tag header
- Export all internal or external links from the current page

SEO Features:
- View Meta Title and Description
- Perform canonical check
- Review page information (word count, language tag, author, last updated date)
- Copy headings structure
- Analyze redirect chains

Whether youâ€™re managing a few links or a large network, LinkChecker makes backlink management and SEO analysis easy and effective.
